unlock.desc_content_1: BitShares X ist eine experimentelle dezentrale Handlesplatform die es erlaubt spezielle Derivate (wie BitGold) zu handeln, die dem Wert der physikalischen Anlage (etwa Gold) folgt, ohne einem externen Preisticker vertrauen zu müssen. Erreicht wird das durch Anlehnung an die Machaniken eines Prediktionsmarktes der Händler dafür belohnt einen Konses über den Preis zu entwickeln. Zudem ist es möglich das Händler eigene Anteile (die nicht notwendigerweise einer physikalischen Anlage folgen) schaffen und handeln.
unlock.desc_content_2: BitShares X wurde zunächst ohne Marktfunktionalitäten gestartet um den Investoren die Gelegenheit zu geben einen Startpreis auszuhandeln. Es folgt eine Update um Marktfunktionalitäten hinzuzufügen.

wallet.info: Das Setzen eines Passworts ist notwendig, da es Ihre Mittel kontrolliert und übertragen kann. Sollten Sie Ihr Passwort vergessen, verlieren Sie den Zugang zu Ihren Mitteln!

market.title: Market
market.margin_orders_explain: A margin call will be executed any time the lowest ask is less than 110% of the moving average and the lowest ask is more than the call price.  The initial call price is 150% of the short price (ie: BTSX 45.00 for a short entered at BTSX 30.00).  This is the price at which 75% of the collateral would be required to buy back the USD necessary to cover the position.  If a margin call is executed and there is any collateral left over, then 5% is kept as network fees and 95% is returned to the owner.
market.margin_call_price_explain: The initial call price is 150% of the short price (ie: BTSX 45.00 for a short entered at BTSX 30.00).  This is the price at which 75% of the collateral would be required to buy back the USD necessary to cover the position.

tip.bid_price_too_high: Your bid price is {{value}}% higher than the lowest ask.
tip.ask_price_too_low: Your ask price is {{value}}% lower than the highest bid.
tip.short_price_too_low: Your short price is {{value}}% lower than the highest bid.
tip.short_price_should_above_min_range: Short price should be above min range price
tip.short_price_should_below_max_range: Short price should be below max range price
tip.confirm_order: Please confirm your order. The order will be funded via {{value}} account.

help.buy_quantity: The amount of {{value}} that you would like to buy.
help.buy_price: The amount you are willing to pay in {{base}} per {{quantity}}.
help.buy_lowest_ask: The lowest price at which your buy order can be immediately matched.
help.buy_total: The number of {{base}} that will be withdrawn from {{account}} account to fund this order.
help.sell_quantity: The amount of {{value}} that you would like to buy.
help.sell_price: The amount you are willing to get in {{base}} per {{quantity}}.
help.sell_highest_bid: The highest price at which your sell order can be immediately matched.
help.sell_total: The number of {{base}} that will be deposited to {{account}} account after sell order is executed.
help.short_quantity: The number {{value}} that you would like to borrow and sell.
help.short_collateral_ratio: The number of {{quantity}} per {{base}} that you are willing to post as collateral. Short orders are matched in order of highest collateral ratio.
help.short_price_limit_direct: The highest price in {{base}} per {{quantity}} at which you are willing to borrow and sell {{base}}. Short orders only match at the price feed or price limit, whichever is more.
help.short_price_limit_inverted: The lowest price in {{base}} per {{quantity}} at which you are willing to borrow and sell {{base}}. Short orders only match at the price feed or price limit, whichever is less.
help.short_feed_price: The median exchange rate on external exchanges according to delegates.
help.short_total: The amount {{value}} required to fund this order. Calculated as Quantity times Collateral Ratio.

privacy.email_warning1: Your email address is only used for the purpose of identifying your
privacy.email_warning2: account which can be tied to your BitShares XT account.  This helps you and others verify that your transactions are sending funds to the expected individual.
privacy.email_warning3: Your email is not shared with anyone and no one will be able to send you spam.

pref.title: Preferences
pref.autocomplete_info: In the transfer form autocomplete the name of the receiver, as the user types

console.type_cmd_and_enter: Type a command and hit Enter

input_name.popover:
Only2 lowercase alphanumeric characters, dots, and dashes.
Must start with a letter and cannot end with a dash.
input_name.note1: Note: Account names cannot be transferred.
input_name.note2: Only lowercase alphanumeric characters, dots, and dashes. Must start with a letter and cannot end with a dash.

help.title: Help
help.console_intro: For a list of commands go to the console page, type help, and press Enter.
help.valid_names_intro: Only lowercase alphanumeric characters, dots, and dashes are allowed. Names must start with a letter and cannot end with a dash. The characters, which are delimited by dots, have to form a valid name. Dots cannot be consecutive or be at start or end of the name.
help.low_participation_rate_80: is displayed when delegate participation rate drops below 80%.
help.low_participation_rate_60: is displayed when delegate participation rate drops below 60%.  Low delegate participation makes blockchain forks likely.
